entry.summary: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile at times in dense smoke. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:26AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot Over The North Slope This Week... High temperatures will be in the 60s and 70s along the coast and in the 80s inland today and Monday. Tuesday through the end of the week will have a cooling trend, but temperatures will still remain above normal. Smoke will continue into early this week.
